title: About the c2d file format

title: About the c2d file format
text: Technically, .c2d files gzip-compressed XML text files Cyclus2-specific content. Let‚Äôs take tour simplified .c2d file get overview structure content. rough XML structure inside .c2d file consists 3 main nodes called System, Program, Training: System contains information athlete, bike settings, environment. Program contains information Cyclus2 program. Training contains data training session, including date, header, row data time point.

title: About the c2d file format
text: System node contains information athlete, bike settings, environment.

title: About the c2d file format
text: Athlete node contains information athlete, see manual section ‚Äú6.1. Athlete data‚Äù. user-entered Cyclus2 menu item System > Athlete Settings. example Athlete element: description elements: Firstname: String first name. Name: String family name. Sex: Numeric code sex; value 1 ‚Äúmale‚Äù? FIXME: Check possible values. DoB: Date birth, format ‚ÄúMM/DD/YYYY 12:00:00 ‚Äù. Area: Drag Area square meters (m¬≤), see manual. Weight: Weight kilograms (kg). Height: Height meters (m). Cw: Drag coefficient, see manual. tp: Obsolete; used encrypted credentials online training platforms like TrainingPeaks.

title: About the c2d file format
text: CycleData node contains information bike settings, see manual section ‚Äú6.2. Bike settings‚Äù. bike parameters user-entered Cyclus2 menu item System > Bike Settings. (Note units may different, e.g., Crank Length entered millimeters, saved meters inside crank element). bike parameters must accurately correspond actual, physical bike used ergometry, enter calculations values pedal force, cadence, speed, inclination cycled distance. example CycleData node; contain numeric values. element desriptions, though still seem slightly unclear. crank: crank length, meters (m). perim: wheel perimeter/circumference, meters (m). weight: bike weight, kilograms (kg). front: number teeth physical/real front chain ring. rear: number teeth physical/real rear sprocket. vfront: FIXME: Unclear? Probably number teeth virtual front chainring, virtual gear settings. vrear: FIXME: Unclear? Probably number teeth virtual rear sprocket, virtual gear settings.

title: About the c2d file format
text: Field node contains information environment, see manual section ‚Äú6.3. Environmental conditions‚Äù. user-entered Cyclus2 menu item System > External Conditions. example Field node: elements‚Äô meanings: AirDens: Air density, kilograms per cubic meter (kg/m¬≥), see manual. FricIdx: Friction index, important track simulation, see manual.

title: About the c2d file format

title: About the c2d file format
text: content Program node currently left undescribed. contains internal information Cyclus2 program, appear primary interest general data analysis.

title: About the c2d file format
text: Training node contains data training session. reduced example Wingate test, note recorded columns vary depending Cyclus2‚Äôs program. See possible headers column data. Date element contains date time training, format ‚ÄúMM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS ()|(PM)‚Äù. FIXME: ‚Äôs meaning RRInt? FIXME: ‚Äôs meaning Delay? Inside Rows node elements R[0-9]* contain data one time point, values separated semicolons.

title: About the c2d file format
text: list possible Header values corresponding meaning (though ‚Äôs work progress!). particular .c2d file contains subset possible variables. Note list‚Äôs numbering matches enum RBM‚Äôs internal code, case becomes relevant point. idCadence idHeartrate idSpeed idTransmission idPedalForce idPower idInclination idWorkPerBeat idLactate idNone idTorque idCdA idCurrent idTime idDistance idRevolutions idWork Relative IDs, added July 2020 idRelPower idRelTorque idRelPedalForce Acceleration IDs, added May 2020 idAngularAcceleration idAccTorque idAccPower idAccPedalForce idAccWork idAccWorkPerBeat Bluetooth IDs, added May 2020 idBtRRInterval idBtPower idBtCadence idDeltaPower idBtLactate idBtVO2 idBtRelVO2 idBtCO2: placeholder future VO2Master idBtRER: placeholder future VO2Master Bluetooth IDs VO2Master, added Aug 2021 idBtRf: respiratory frequency idBtTv: tidal volume idBtVe: ventilation idBtSmO2 idBtTHb Bluetooth IDs, added Jan 2022 idBtCoreBodyTemperature idBtSkinTemperature idDio: state digital inputs outputs SyncInterface, added June 2024 Diagnosis IDs, added May 2020 idMotorTemperature idFrameTemperature idBatteryCapacity idFlags idMemory idStageIndex: new since Aug 2021, jumps stages remain visible/traceable StageIndex: previous name idStageIndex, since Aug 2020 value changed 31 63 64-bit flag can derived UNKNOWN_VALUE following two values commented thus enum numbers assigned: idPostLactate: Lactate following workload idRegenerationHeartRate: Heart rate regeneration intervals

Technically, .c2d files ‚Äújust‚Äù gzip-compressed XML text files custom content, see vignette("-c2d-format") information.

title: Parse C2D File Format From Cyclus2 Ergometers
text: Working Cyclus2 data native .c2d file format many advantages derived, exported formats: .c2d files include information, e.g., bike settings impossible export. Depending export settings, exported files may lack data (later) interest, may lack numerical precision. Simpler procedure: need save data twice, export analysis .c2d archiving. Interoperability: Even single lab, agreeing export format take time effort, change may make previously exported data incompatible. contrast, .c2d files remain , even across labs, thus analysis scripts remain compatible.
